entry.articleIntro: The Freedom Fund's new report 'Unlocking what works: how community-based interventions are ending bonded labour in India' summarises the results of five external evaluations of the Freedom Fund's India programmes.

articleImage.title: Legatum Freedom Fund Unlocking What Works Report

articleBlocks.text:
These evaluations affirm that the power to end modern slavery lies in frontline communities. The report also illustrates that the Freedom Fund's programmes are having a direct impact and are successfully building on this community-level work to positively change wider policies and systems.

Read the report here...

relatedArticles.title: Insights from the field: Legatum’s visit to Freedom Fund programmes in Ethiopia
relatedArticles.metaDescription: In June 2023, I travelled to Ethiopia with a group of six other Legatum staff members to witness the work of the Freedom Fund’s local partners in action.

relatedArticles.title: Abundance of opportunities for investors in India
relatedArticles.metaDescription: Legatum's Chief Investment Officer meets India's Finance Minister in the USA to discuss investment opportunities and the vital role foreign investors play.

relatedArticles.title: MPL becomes a unicorn
relatedArticles.metaDescription: Mobile esports platform Mobile Premier League raises Series E round of funding from Legatum Capital at a pre-money valuation of $2.3 billion USD.

relatedArticles.metaDescription: Why is modern slavery so widespread and pervasive? And what is being done to address it?
